channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_IntrusionProtection_Statistic Datatype Description The IntrusionProtection_Statistic is used exclusively by the getMainStatistics method on the TippingPointReporting service, and serves mainly as a pair object, storing a name and an attack count. Name is usually the name of an attack, but it can also be an attacking IP Address Local attackCount The number of attacks effecting this name over the time period Type: integer name Either the name of the attack in question, or the attacking IP Address Type: string
